com.samysadi.acs.hardware.ram

Interface Ram

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Entity, MemoryUnit<RamZone>, Notifier, Probed
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    VirtualRam
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RamDefault, VirtualRamDynamic, VirtualRamElastic, VirtualRamFixedSize

    public interface Ram
extends MemoryUnit<RamZone>
    All implementation classes should provide a constructor with one argument of long type that specifies the Ram's capacity.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        Ram clone()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Creates a clone of this entity and sets its parent to null.

        This is a deep clone method which also clones children entities and sets their parents to the newly created clone.

        Implementations must ensure that the new clone will be independent from the current entity.

        Specified by:
        clone in interface Entity
        Specified by:
        clone in interface MemoryUnit<RamZone>
        Specified by:
        clone in interface Notifier
